title: Ass√©dio
overview: Freely inspired by real facts, Harassment narrates the controversial journey of Roger Abdelmassih (in fiction, Roger Sadala/Antonio Calloni) on a collision course with a group of ex-patients who will break the anonymity and reveal the true face of the one who had the power of creation in his hands. In the five years that separate the doctor from the monster is the story of those women who faced their traumas, broke the silence and reported him to justice.
